item.description:
Stuart has been kind enough to host an afternoon of game playing at his community clubhouse on Saturday, March 7 from 1:00-5:00 p.m. Those interested afterward can go out to dinner as a group. (Should you be interested, please say so in your RSVP and feel free to list suggestions.)

What people should bring: games, games, games (Did I mention games?). You are also welcome to bring light snacks or drinks to nosh on during the game day / hold us off before dinner.

Directional details:

The Meetup will be in the apartment community's clubhouse, which is in the same building as the leasing office. Basically, no matter what direction one is coming from, take Rte. 128 north to exit 21, leasing office on left. Please note: There is NO connection to the other side of the road if one takes exit 21 from 128 South. Only exit 21 - 128 North works.

Detail directions copied and pasted from website below.

From Boston:
I-93 N toward Concord NH
Take exit 37A to merge onto I-95 N/RT-128 N toward Peabody
Continue to follow RT-128 N
Take exit 21 onto Trask Ln
Take 2nd left, leasing office is on the hill

From points west:
Merge onto I-90 E/Massachusetts Turnpike/Mass Pike via the ramp to Framingham/Boston
Take exit 14 to merge onto I-95 N/RT-128 N
Continue to follow RT-128 N
Take exit 21 onto Trask Ln
Take 2nd left, leasing office is on the hill

From points north:
Take either I-95 S or I-93 S
Take exit 45 to merge onto RT-128 N toward Gloucester
Take exit 21 onto Trask Ln
Take 2nd left, leasing office is on the hill

Your contact phone number: 978-766-4745.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Board Games in Beverly
